data.description:
The Virtual Reality navigation of the new offices of the TLC in Forlì offers an extraordinarily engaging and exclusive experience. Through the latest generation VR technologies, one can now explore the entire structure in a detailed and interactive manner, even before setting foot inside the building.

Upon launching the navigation application, one finds themselves immediately immersed in a hyperrealistic three-dimensional environment. With a simple movement of the head or a touch on the controller, it is possible to rotate 360 degrees, observe the details of the office from every angle, and even move from one place to another within the vast complex.

The new offices of the TLC in Forlì, with their modern and functional design, reveal all their splendour through this virtual reality adventure. The precision of the details in the 3D renderings of the interior design is impressive: from the vibrant colors of the walls, to the contemporary furniture, all the way to the ergonomic arrangement of the workspaces.

changelog.change_log:
Added left/right turn functionality on the right joystick's X-axis. The turn is performed in 45-degree increments.
Added the ability to move left/right using the X-axis of the left joystick.
Added the ability to move forward/backward using the Y-axis of the left joystick.
